St_C_BeamOfLight.lore:
-- Experiment Log, Year 3, Day 20 of Month 1
-- Author: Carrier Bayonet
-- Research Subject: Beam of Light


Subject: Young widow. Severe burns from face to shoulders. Infected wound on cheekbone.
Result: Cheekbone infection visibly reduced. Burns appear slightly faded.

Subject: Boy. Open wounds on back from whipping.
Result: Back wounds healing well. Boy claims his "thieving habit" is now "cured" and demands to be released.

Subject: Jeff (the infamous murderer). Gunshot wounds to both ankles and wrists.
Result: Complained of intense head pain, then a small "pop" sound was heard before he passed out.
Note: Still breathing but remains unconscious.


P.S. His Majesty King Rojit has provided 10 additional death row inmates. Much research remains on this beam, but one thing is certain: this power of dreams will save many lives.

St_C_MassProtection.lore:
Every time the Moonlight Council convenes, we extend this great barrier. It is a solemn act, signifying that the Society exists solely in the pursuit of truth, under the profound and absolute belief that we must not interfere in any affairs of the outside world.

Lately, however, I have felt a strange dissonance and a cold realization within this absolute silence. This perfect peace so thoroughly erases the cries of countless lives fading away outside, and our "neutrality" is merely a noble privilege gained at the cost of remaining silent before their suffering.

For some reason, I am reminded of that child's face. Aurena. I realize that the logic we used to block her "dangerous" inquiries bears an uncanny resemblance to the logic we now use with this barrier, shutting out the "dangerous" chaos of the world.

Are we truly "protecting" the truth? Or are we merely "protecting" ourselves from everything we have given up trying to understand?

I wonder if this sacred protection ultimately serves not our sublime neutrality, but our deepest cowardice. I still do not know the answer.

St_C_SparklingWaterGun.lore:
Backstreet Tips #5:

Ingredients: Nettles you find along the roadside, and a poisonous herb with red-tipped leaves (don't know the name).
Preparation: Grind them up in a stone mortar and mix with water.
Use: Perfect for leaving stains on the fancy cloaks of those pretentious nobles. If any touch their skin, they will be dealing with a tingling itch for days. Consider that a little bonus.
Analysis: There's nothing better for getting under their skin.

For rats like us, this is the only way to tug at the cat's whiskers. Life is precious, after all.

St_C_Whirlwind.lore:
Excerpt from the Chronicles of the Forgotten Snowy Mountain:

In the days before the great mountain was broken, giant children played a game called "Chasing the Blizzard." Each child would carry a small wooden axe, mimicking their ruler, Skoll. His wild, spinning destruction appeared to them as a hero's dance and a song of glory.

The children would spin around until they collapsed from dizziness, dreaming that one day they too might protect the mountain as the great storm itself.

No one knew.

The hero's dance they so admired would become the very storm that shattered their world. The song of glory they sang would turn into the mountain's dirge.

She dedicated herself to guarding the natural order, where flowers bloom, wither, and bloom again, all according to providence. But the providence she trusted was shattered when her younger sibling was overtaken by madness.
St_D_CircleOfLife.achievementDescription: As Nachia, defeat a Guardian of Impermanence without taking any damage.

As the celestial stars align and sing in harmony, my eyes will once again capture the primordial light of creation.

St_D_MercyOfEl.achievementDescription: Perform 9 basic attacks within 5 seconds using Vesper.

St_D_PrismaticEyes.name: Prismatic Vision
St_D_PrismaticEyes.description: Increases <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> by 20%<sprite=5>. While you can't perform <color=yellow>basic attacks</color> yourself, a <color=yellow>Book</color> automatically performs <color=yellow>basic attacks</color> on the nearest enemy to Bismuth, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>70%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>additional damage</color>.
St_D_PrismaticEyes.rawDesc: Increases <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> by {0}. While you can't perform <color=yellow>basic attacks</color> yourself, a <color=yellow>Book</color> automatically performs <color=yellow>basic attacks</color> on the nearest enemy to Bismuth, dealing {1} <color=yellow>additional damage</color>.
St_D_PrismaticEyes.lore:
When the girl opens her eyes, the old book begins to read the world. 

She sits quietly, gazing at the world beyond its pages. 
The book writes the next line of the story, and as each sentence follows the last, 
the world moves as the book wishes and as the girl wishes. 

The girl is overjoyed to finally see her own story unfold.

When <color=yellow>Resolve</color> hits an enemy, <color=yellow>Vesper</color> <color=yellow>restores</color> {2} of his <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color>.
St_D_Resolve.lore: My flesh embodies the very will of the Order. The scars carved into my body are nothing more than medals that prove my resolve. Until the will of El'pyros is fulfilled, I shall never fall.

St_D_TheKillingFlow.name: One Step, One Kill
St_D_TheKillingFlow.description:

Instead of receiving <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> bonuses, your <color=yellow>Attack Damage</color> increases by {0} for every 1% <color=yellow>Additional Attack Speed</color>.

St_D_TheKillingFlow.lore: With every step, a life is taken. There is no emotion, no pain, only the body recalling every movement.

St_E_AntiGravity.name: Anti-Gravity
St_E_AntiGravity.description: Reverses gravity in the target location, lifting all enemies within the range for 1.6 seconds. Then, slams them down, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>400%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color>.
St_E_AntiGravity.rawDesc: Reverses gravity in the target location, lifting all enemies within the range for {0} seconds. Then, slams them down, dealing {1} <color=yellow>damage</color>.
St_E_AntiGravity.lore:
Our master, Lord Erebos, simply wished to please Lady Nyx.

When he lightly stomped his foot in the starry forest, steadfast mountain ranges would rise and float like pebbles, suspended by a thread. With a single gesture of his hand, the earth would split apart and rise again, creating new landscapes. Our master would laugh like a child at these magnificent sights. Thet power that shook the heavens was nothing more than a dazzling proof of love meant for one alone.

Yet was I the only one who saw the cold shadow cross Lady Nyx's face in those moments?

What shone in her eyes was not joy, but awe and... a fierce spark of jealousy she could not conceal.


- Memory trace of a nameless night spirit.

St_E_Blink.name: Blink
St_E_Blink.description: <color=yellow>Teleports</color> a short distance and deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>244%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to nearby enemies. <color=yellow>Cooldown</color> is reduced by 13% for each enemy hit.
St_E_Blink.rawDesc: <color=yellow>Teleports</color> a short distance and deals {0} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to nearby enemies. <color=yellow>Cooldown</color> is reduced by {1} for each enemy hit.
St_E_Blink.lore:
Hunting Journal
Year x of Rojit's Rule, Day xx of Month x, Weather: Cloudy
Hunting Location: Hising Forest
Today's Harvest: Some wild strawberries
Whenever I see something burning, it pulls me back to that day.
My wife, suddenly engulfed in flames, disappeared from sight.

It happened in an instant. She turned to ashes, lost in a blue flame so bright it made my eyes sting.

I checked every bullet and pouch of gunpowder, but nothing was missing. That fire wasn't normal. No smoke, no heat, just quick destruction.

Today, while watching the bowman through the scope, I discovered something.

The Lucid bastards use blue flames.

...

I need more information.

To bring my wife back, I must be careful. Now's the time to swallow my boiling vengeance.

St_E_ChainLightning.name: Chain Lightning
St_E_ChainLightning.description: Casts a bouncing lightning that deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>400%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to the first target and bounces up to 5 times, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>185%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color>.
St_E_ChainLightning.rawDesc: Casts a bouncing lightning that deals {0} <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to the first target and bounces up to {1} times, dealing {2} <color=yellow>Light damage</color>.
St_E_ChainLightning.lore:
-- Experiment Log
-- Day 273 since the experiment began
-- Written by Aurena


A partial success.
I've managed to control the power of lightning to some extent, but it's inherently unstable. The electrical discharge jumps unpredictably to unintended targets.

However, I've stumbled upon something even more significant. I've uncovered an insight into the fundamental power of dreams, but I'm running out of space in this log. For now, I'll refer to this as "Dismantling Force" and continue my research.
St_E_ChainLightning.achievementDescription: Deal 1,500 or more damage in a single hit.

St_E_ClutchesOfMalice.name: Clutches of Malice
St_E_ClutchesOfMalice.description:
Summons blood tentacles at the target location, pulling up to 4<sprite=5> enemies. The tentacles attach to enemies, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>80%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> and an additional <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> to pulled enemies. 
When this Memory is empowered, the <color=yellow>number of enemies</color> pulled and the <color=yellow>area of effect</color> increase.
St_E_ClutchesOfMalice.rawDesc:
Summons blood tentacles at the target location, pulling up to {0} enemies. The tentacles attach to enemies, dealing {1} <color=yellow>damage</color> and an additional {2} <color=yellow>damage</color> to pulled enemies. 
When this Memory is empowered, the <color=yellow>number of enemies</color> pulled and the <color=yellow>area of effect</color> increase.
St_E_ClutchesOfMalice.lore:
How many days have I been lost in this twisted dream world?
As my sense of time dulled, something began to take shape before my eyes.
Beyond the mist, "I" was standing there.

At first I was merely curious, but the moment I met its gaze, I realized what writhed in those depths was not my soul, but something strange and damp. It was fear itself.
As it slowly reached toward me, its back split open and blood-red tentacles burst forth. At their ends hung not just pieces of flesh, but living eyeballs, staring intently at me like seeds planted to spread this nightmare across the world.
Only then did I understand. That was not my reflection in a mirror. It was a hungry clutch of nightmares, using me as a host and seeking to consume this world.


- Memory trace engraved in someone's fragment
St_E_ClutchesOfMalice.achievementDescription: Take the Merchant's unattended backpack 12 times.

St_E_CrimsonLance.name: Crimson Lance

St_E_FlameJet.name: Flame Jet
St_E_FlameJet.description: Unleashes a stream of flames for 2.5 seconds. Enemies hit by these flames take <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>336%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> per second.
St_E_FlameJet.rawDesc: Unleashes a stream of flames for {0} seconds. Enemies hit by these flames take {1} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> per second.
St_E_FlameJet.lore:
Hunting Journal
2nd Year of Rojit's Rule, Day xx of Month x, Weather: Clear
Hunting Location: Igni Wetlands
Today's Harvest: A pocketful of nettles

There are rules I always follow when I go hunting in the Igni Wetlands.

1. Be cautious if you spot claw marks on mangrove roots.

2. If those marks aren't covered in moss, steer clear of that direction.

3. If you see smoke in the distance or smoldering embers on charred trees, head home immediately.

I made these rules after what I saw through my scope last summer. Some fool tugged on a half-scorched Kalimberry vine and came face to face with a monstrous Barasus.

I don't think I've seen flames that big, not even at the Royal Guard's fire weapon demonstrations.

Allies are <color=yellow>healed</color> for <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>80%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Health</color> for each <color=yellow>elemental effect</color> removed from them.
St_E_MassCleanse.rawDesc: Cleanses the target location, dealing {0} <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to enemies and granting <color=yellow>Unstoppable</color> to allies for {1} seconds while <color=yellow>removing</color> most <color=yellow>debuffs</color>. Allies are <color=yellow>healed</color> for {2} <color=yellow>Health</color> for each <color=yellow>elemental effect</color> removed from them.
St_E_MassCleanse.lore:
The madness of nightmares is spreading. 
The forest's balance is already severely disrupted.
Diseased branches must be cut away before the entire forest rots and collapses.
What I am about to do is nothing but a cold and resolut cleansing, for the sake of the forest's order, which matters above all else.

The little compassion I have left, at least for this moment, must be set aside.
This is my role and duty as a keeper of the forest.

...

My beloved sibling, I pray that in your presence as well,
I can fulfill my responsibility...

St_E_Rewind.lore:
Someone's fierce regret and relentless drive.
A desperate wish to turn back time and correct past mistakes.
And the lingering memories of the one who brought this desire to life.

St_E_UmbralEdge.name: Umbral Edge
St_E_UmbralEdge.description: For 7 seconds, imbues your weapon with the power of darkness, increasing <color=yellow>Critical Strike Chance</color> by 20%<sprite=5> and dealing <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>52%</color><sprite=5> additional <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> on <color=yellow>attack</color>. <color=yellow>Melee Travelers</color> deal 25% increased additional damage.
St_E_UmbralEdge.rawDesc: For {0} seconds, imbues your weapon with the power of darkness, increasing <color=yellow>Critical Strike Chance</color> by {1} and dealing {2} additional <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> on <color=yellow>attack</color>. <color=yellow>Melee Travelers</color> deal {3} increased additional damage.
St_E_UmbralEdge.lore:
After hearing rumors about Shangri-La, I returned to the Puppeteer's workshop.

The abandoned corpses remained, and the ruins carried their familiar stench. My memory tells me this is where the tragedy that took everything from me began. Yet my body and mind showed no reaction, just as I expected.

I wasn't here for sentimentality. I had another purpose. Amidst the ruins, I found traces of a memory, seemingly hidden by the Puppeteer.

It was the memory of a swordsman I did not know, carrying a foreign blade, not of eastern origin. He was not simply cutting; he had captured the abyss within his sword and wielded the void itself.

A strange sense of kinship came over me. I understood that sword. It was a kind of emptiness that only those with hollow souls could inhabit.

St_E_VileStrike.name: Vile Strike
St_E_VileStrike.description: Briefly vanish, then reappear at the target location, slashing enemies for <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark damage</color>, <color=yellow>stunning</color> them for 1 seconds, and triggering <color=yellow>attack effects</color>. St_L_Blizzard.name: Blizzard
St_L_Blizzard.description: Summons a Blizzard in the target area 4<sprite=5> times every 0.7 seconds, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>180%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Cold damage</color> to enemies and granting allies a <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>60%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Barrier</color> that fades over 3.5 seconds.
St_L_Blizzard.rawDesc: Summons a Blizzard in the target area {0} times every {1} seconds, dealing {2} <color=yellow>Cold damage</color> to enemies and granting allies a {3} <color=yellow>Barrier</color> that fades over {4} seconds.
St_L_Blizzard.lore:
My breath... was stolen away.
Screams froze in the air, and the bone-piercing cold stripped me of all feeling.

That wolf's howl was not of a victor. It was the wail of one who had lost everything, the desperate scream of a shattered kingdom.
And we died beneath that crushing despair, nothing more than dust, choking on our helplessness.
This blizzard is not mere cold.
It carries his despair mixed with my curse, his sorrow swirling with my rage.

This is a living hell.


- Memory trace of a mercenary buried in the Snowy Mountain, moments before death.
St_L_Blizzard.achievementDescription: Defeat the Snowy Mountain King while having 4 Cold damage Memories.

St_L_ButchersStrike.name: Butcher's Strike
St_L_ButchersStrike.description:
Swing a blade forward, dealing <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>200%</color><sprite=5> damage to enemies and <color=yellow>reducing</color> their <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> by 30% for 2 seconds.

If an enemy hit by the blade dies within 3 seconds, they drop <color=yellow>Meat</color>. Collecting <color=yellow>Meat</color> <color=yellow>restores</color> <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>25%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Health</color> and permanently increases the <color=yellow>damage</color> of Butcher's Strike by 1%.
St_L_ButchersStrike.rawDesc:
Swing a blade forward, dealing {0} damage to enemies and <color=yellow>reducing</color> their <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> by {1} for {2} seconds.

If an enemy hit by the blade dies within {3} seconds, they drop <color=yellow>Meat</color>. Collecting <color=yellow>Meat</color> <color=yellow>restores</color> {4} <color=yellow>Health</color> and permanently increases the <color=yellow>damage</color> of Butcher's Strike by {5}.
St_L_ButchersStrike.shortDescription: Forward damage, collect meat to heal and grow stronger

St_L_CoinExplosion.name: Coin Explosion
St_L_CoinExplosion.description:
Throws a <color=yellow>Coin</color> at the cost of 1% of your current <color=yellow>Gold</color>. The <color=yellow>Coin</color> <color=yellow>explodes</color> upon hitting the first enemy, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>150%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>stunning</color> them for 1 seconds.

After the explosion, there's a 50% chance for the <color=yellow>explosion damage</color> to permanently double, but also a 50% chance to lose all accumulated increases.
St_L_CoinExplosion.rawDesc:
Throws a <color=yellow>Coin</color> at the cost of {0} of your current <color=yellow>Gold</color>. The <color=yellow>Coin</color> <color=yellow>explodes</color> upon hitting the first enemy, dealing {1} <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>stunning</color> them for {2} seconds.

After the explosion, there's a 50% chance for the <color=yellow>explosion damage</color> to permanently double, but also a 50% chance to lose all accumulated increases.
St_L_CoinExplosion.achievementDescription: Enter the Pure White Dream while having 4 Memories of the same type.

St_L_LightExplosion.name: Radiant Explosion
St_L_LightExplosion.description: Target an ally or enemy to create a <color=yellow>Radiant Explosion</color> at their location after 1.5 seconds. The explosion deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>400%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to nearby enemies and <color=yellow>stuns</color> them for 1 seconds. If an enemy is <color=yellow>killed</color> by the explosion, the explosion <color=yellow>repeats</color>.
St_L_LightExplosion.rawDesc: Target an ally or enemy to create a <color=yellow>Radiant Explosion</color> at their location after {0} seconds. The explosion deals {1} <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to nearby enemies and <color=yellow>stuns</color> them for {2} seconds. If an enemy is <color=yellow>killed</color> by the explosion, the explosion <color=yellow>repeats</color>.
St_L_LightExplosion.shortDescription: Area Light damage, stuns enemies, and repeats on kill

St_L_MentalCorruption.name: Mental Corruption
St_L_MentalCorruption.description: Corrupts the minds of the target and those around them, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> and <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>60%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> every 0.5 seconds until death.
St_L_MentalCorruption.rawDesc: Corrupts the minds of the target and those around them, dealing {0} <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> and {1} <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> every {2} seconds until death.
St_L_MentalCorruption.shortDescription: Dark damage over time until death
St_L_MentalCorruption.lore:
As I wander through this world, I sometimes meet people who are aware of the dream world. A rare few remember our encounters completely, allowing us to keep connecting again and again.

One day, while speaking with one of them as usual, I noticed the light suddenly fade from their eyes. That empty gaze was fixed on me.

"Is she truly happy here?"

Suddenly, he called out to me with a question.

"Or is she merely a beautiful doll trapped in your perfect cage?"

In that moment, my world shook. A wave of fear froze my heart. As if my anxiety were contagious, everyone around us began to warp, their hidden hatred and fear for each other rising to the surface.

With my power, I erased the source of that corruption, leaving not a single trace behind. Like an illusion, the chaos vanished, and the world slipped back into its false tranquility. But I saw it. In the shadows, something unseen was mocking my deepest self.

No. This utopia is mine. My wife... my family must be real. I cannot lose them again.

I will make sure this never happens again. No cracks, no doubts.

Never again, will I allow it.

St_L_Multishot.name: Arrow Storm
St_L_Multishot.description: For 6 seconds, increase Attack Speed by 15%<sprite=5> and Movement Speed by 10%. During this time, each <color=yellow>attack</color> fires 3 arrows. Each arrow deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>35%</color><sprite=5> damage, and the first arrow triggers <color=yellow>attack effects</color>.
St_L_Multishot.rawDesc: For {0} seconds, increase Attack Speed by {1} and Movement Speed by {2}. During this time, each <color=yellow>attack</color> fires {3} arrows. Each arrow deals {4} damage, and the first arrow triggers <color=yellow>attack effects</color>.
St_L_Multishot.shortDescription: Increases Attack Speed and empowers attacks

St_L_PyranasFireball.description: <color=yellow>Transforms</color> into a fast-moving <color=yellow>Fireball</color> for 3 seconds, gaining 50<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Armor</color> and immunity to <color=yellow>Fire damage</color>. Each time you hit an enemy, deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>220%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> and <color=yellow>extends</color> the transformation by 0.2<sprite=5> seconds, up to a maximum of 3<sprite=5> seconds.
St_L_PyranasFireball.rawDesc: <color=yellow>Transforms</color> into a fast-moving <color=yellow>Fireball</color> for {0} seconds, gaining {1} <color=yellow>Armor</color> and immunity to <color=yellow>Fire damage</color>. If this damage <color=yellow>kills</color> an enemy, gain 5<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dream Dust</color>.

If you collide with an enemy, the <color=yellow>dash</color> ends early, dealing {2} of your <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color> as <color=yellow>damage</color> to enemies and knocking them back.

St_M_DreamyWaltz.rawDesc:
Move quickly to dodge enemy attacks.
After dodging, release a dreamy wave that grants all nearby allies except yourself a <color=yellow>Barrier</color> equal to {0} of their <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color> and increases their <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> by {1} for {2} seconds. Effects are increased by 100% for summons.

St_M_FastFeet.name: Swift Steps
St_M_FastFeet.description: Move swiftly to dodge enemy attacks.
St_M_FastFeet.rawDesc: Move swiftly to dodge enemy attacks.

St_M_FeatheryDash.description: Move swiftly to dodge enemy attacks.
St_M_FeatheryDash.rawDesc: Move swiftly to dodge enemy attacks.

St_M_FlashStep.name: Flash Step
St_M_FlashStep.description: Move swiftly to dodge enemy attacks.
St_M_FlashStep.rawDesc: Move swiftly to dodge enemy attacks.

<color=yellow>Can be used even when unable to use Memories.</color>
St_M_Flicker.rawDesc:
Teleport quickly to dodge enemy attacks.
<color=yellow>Can be used even when unable to use Memories.</color>

St_M_NimbleDodge.description: Move swiftly to dodge enemy attacks.
St_M_NimbleDodge.rawDesc: Move swiftly to dodge enemy attacks.
