St_M_Sprint.description: Quickly dash a short distance to dodge enemy attacks, then increase <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> by 75% and <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> by 100% for 1 seconds.
St_M_Sprint.rawDesc: Quickly dash a short distance to dodge enemy attacks, then increase <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> by {0} and <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> by {1} for {2} seconds.

St_Q_CruelSun.name: Cruel Sun
St_Q_CruelSun.description:
<color=yellow>Hold the cast key</color> to focus the sun's power into your hammer. Once fully charged, slam the ground to deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>100%</color><sprite=5>-<sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>350%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>stun</color> them for 0.5-1.5 seconds.

While channeling, you can't move but become <color=yellow>Unstoppable</color> and gain 60<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Armor</color>.
St_Q_CruelSun.rawDesc:
<color=yellow>Hold the cast key</color> to focus the sun's power into your hammer. Once fully charged, slam the ground to deal {0}-{1} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>stun</color> them for {2}-{3} seconds.

While channeling, you can't move but become <color=yellow>Unstoppable</color> and gain {4} <color=yellow>Armor</color>.
St_Q_CruelSun.lore: Bow before the sun's judgment. If you will not kneel, then my hammer will make you kneel.

St_Q_Discipline.name: Discipline
St_Q_Discipline.description: Dash toward the target and slam your hammer, dealing <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>110%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to enemies and triggering 50% <color=yellow>attack effects</color>. Each time you <color=yellow>attack</color> an enemy, the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> is <color=yellow>reduced</color> by 8%.
St_Q_Discipline.rawDesc: Dash toward the target and slam your hammer, dealing {0} <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to enemies and triggering {1} <color=yellow>attack effects</color>. Each time you <color=yellow>attack</color> an enemy, the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> is <color=yellow>reduced</color> by {2}.
St_Q_Discipline.lore:
Heretic, why do you flee?
My mace simply leads lost sheep back to the righteous path. No one escapes this teaching. If the price of learning is broken bones, then that is the price that must be paid.
St_Q_Discipline.achievementDescription: Have 3 Dash or Teleport Memories at once as Vesper.

St_Q_EtherealInfluence.name: Ether's Influence
St_Q_EtherealInfluence.description: Launch <color=yellow>Ether</color> that moves forward and returns, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>160%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to enemies. Reactivate to cause <color=yellow>Ether</color> to <color=yellow>explode</color>, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>180%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color> and <color=yellow>rooting</color> enemies for 3 seconds.
St_Q_EtherealInfluence.rawDesc: Launch <color=yellow>Ether</color> that moves forward and returns, dealing {0} <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to enemies. Reactivate to cause <color=yellow>Ether</color> to <color=yellow>explode</color>, dealing {1} <color=yellow>Light damage</color> and <color=yellow>rooting</color> enemies for {2} seconds.
St_Q_EtherealInfluence.lore:
Behold, this most fundamental substance.
From your soul to the earth beneath your feet, it is the beginning and end of all existence.
Like the first breath of the universe itself...

St_Q_Fleche.name: Flèche
St_Q_Fleche.description:
Dash toward the target, dealing <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>140%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color>, immediately performing a <color=yellow>basic attack</color>, and temporarily increasing <color=yellow>Mist</color>'s <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color>. If this <color=yellow>damage</color> kills the target, restore 15<sprite=5> Health and reduce the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> by 15%.

<color=yellow>Charges</color> are fully restored at once.
St_Q_Fleche.rawDesc:
Dash toward the target, dealing {0} <color=yellow>damage</color>, immediately performing a <color=yellow>basic attack</color>, and temporarily increasing <color=yellow>Mist</color>'s <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color>. If this <color=yellow>damage</color> kills the target, restore {1} Health and reduce the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> by {2}.

<color=yellow>Charges</color> are fully restored at once.
St_Q_Fleche.achievementDescription: Defeat any elemental 75 times as Mist.

St_Q_GoldenBurst.name: Golden Explosion
St_Q_GoldenBurst.description:
Create a Golden Explosion forward that deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>110%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>restores</color> <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>28%</color><sprite=5> Health to allies. When hitting a single target, this explosion's <color=yellow>damage</color> or <color=yellow>healing</color> is increased by 100%.

Upon casting, gain stacks of <color=yellow>Wither</color> for 3.5 seconds and <color=yellow>sacrifice</color> 5% of your Maximum Health. Each <color=yellow>Wither</color> stack increases the explosion's <color=yellow>damage</color> and <color=yellow>healing</color> by 100%, but also increases the Health <color=yellow>sacrificed</color> by 7% of your Maximum Health.
St_Q_GoldenBurst.rawDesc:
Create a Golden Explosion forward that deals {0} <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>restores</color> {1} Health to allies. When hitting a single target, this explosion's <color=yellow>damage</color> or <color=yellow>healing</color> is increased by {2}.

Upon casting, gain stacks of <color=yellow>Wither</color> for {3} seconds and <color=yellow>sacrifice</color> {4} of your Maximum Health. Each <color=yellow>Wither</color> stack increases the explosion's <color=yellow>damage</color> and <color=yellow>healing</color> by {5}, but also increases the Health <color=yellow>sacrificed</color> by {6} of your Maximum Health.
St_Q_GoldenBurst.lore:
The amount of decomposition energy input is directly proportional to the destructive power output.

The fatigue that follows each experiment is interesting, but not particularly important.

St_Q_HandCannon.name: Hand Cannon
St_Q_HandCannon.description: Shoot a blazing bullet that pushes you backward, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>80%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to enemies in front. Nearby enemies that are hit instead take <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>180%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> and are knocked back.
St_Q_HandCannon.rawDesc: Shoot a blazing bullet that pushes you backward, dealing {0} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to enemies in front. Nearby enemies that are hit instead take {1} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> and are knocked back.
St_Q_HandCannon.lore: Just a single use makes it very difficult to maintain the firearm.

St_Q_IncendiaryRounds.name: Incendiary Rounds
St_Q_IncendiaryRounds.description: The next 4 basic attacks are 60%<sprite=5> faster and deal an additional <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>100%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color>, briefly increasing <color=yellow>Lacerta</color>'s <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color>.
St_Q_IncendiaryRounds.rawDesc: The next {0} basic attacks are {1} faster and deal an additional {2} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color>, briefly increasing <color=yellow>Lacerta</color>'s <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color>.
St_Q_IncendiaryRounds.lore: Lacerta shared many fiery wonders with his wife, who loved the beauty of flames, but he never let her handle incendiary rounds, insisting they were far too dangerous.
St_Q_IncendiaryRounds.achievementDescription: Defeat the Heroic Boss 5 times as Lacerta.

St_Q_Laceration.name: Laceration
St_Q_Laceration.description:
Each basic attack alternates Laceration's form between <color=#f28a8a>Red Form</color> and <color=#8ab2f2>Blue Form</color>. When this skill is cast, it unleashes a different effect depending on the current form.

<color=#f28a8a>Red Form:</color> Dash a short distance, slashing enemies in a narrow area for <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>155%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> and triggering <color=yellow>attack effects</color>. When you hit an enemy for the first time, reduce <color=yellow>cooldown</color> by 35% seconds.

<color=#8ab2f2>Blue Form:</color> Leap into the air to become briefly <color=yellow>Invulnerable</color>, then swing your blade to deal <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> and trigger <color=yellow>attack effects</color> to all nearby enemies.
St_Q_Laceration.rawDesc:
Each basic attack alternates Laceration's form between <color=#f28a8a>Red Form</color> and <color=#8ab2f2>Blue Form</color>. When this skill is cast, it unleashes a different effect depending on the current form.

<color=#f28a8a>Red Form:</color> Dash a short distance, slashing enemies in a narrow area for {0} <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> and triggering <color=yellow>attack effects</color>. When you hit an enemy for the first time, reduce <color=yellow>cooldown</color> by {1} seconds.

<color=#8ab2f2>Blue Form:</color> Leap into the air to become briefly <color=yellow>Invulnerable</color>, then swing your blade to deal {2} <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> and trigger <color=yellow>attack effects</color> to all nearby enemies.
St_Q_Laceration.lore:
Attack or avoid, but the result is the same.
Only your movement takes a different form.

St_Q_Lunge.name: Lunge
St_Q_Lunge.description: Dash forward and thrust your saber toward the nearest enemy. Triggers <color=yellow>attack effects</color> and deals <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>200%</color><sprite=5> damage to all enemies hit by the saber. Each time <color=yellow>Astrid's Masterpiece</color> triggers, reduce this Memory's <color=yellow>cooldown</color> by 0.5 seconds.
St_Q_Lunge.rawDesc: Dash forward and thrust your saber toward the nearest enemy. Triggers <color=yellow>attack effects</color> and deals {0} damage to all enemies hit by the saber. Each time <color=yellow>Astrid's Masterpiece</color> triggers, reduce this Memory's <color=yellow>cooldown</color> by {1} seconds.

St_Q_MoonlightPact.name: Moonlight Pact
St_Q_MoonlightPact.description:
<color=yellow>Fenrir</color> leaps to the target location, slashing enemies for <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> and stunning them for 0.5 seconds. For each enemy hit, <color=yellow>Fenrir</color> <color=yellow>heals</color> for 8%<sprite=5> of his Maximum Health. Each time <color=yellow>Fenrir</color> attacks, the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> of this ability is reduced by 1 seconds.

<color=yellow>Passive Effect:</color> <color=yellow>Summons</color> <color=yellow>Fenrir the Werewolf</color>, who follows Nachia. <color=yellow>Fenrir</color> has 350 Health and 40<sprite=5> Armor, claws enemies for <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>130%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color>, and triggers 50% <color=yellow>attack effects</color>.
St_Q_MoonlightPact.rawDesc:
<color=yellow>Fenrir</color> leaps to the target location, slashing enemies for {0} <color=yellow>damage</color> and stunning them for {1} seconds. For each enemy hit, <color=yellow>Fenrir</color> <color=yellow>heals</color> for {2} of his Maximum Health. Each time <color=yellow>Fenrir</color> attacks, the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> of this ability is reduced by {3} seconds.

<color=yellow>Passive Effect:</color> <color=yellow>Summons</color> <color=yellow>Fenrir the Werewolf</color>, who follows Nachia. <color=yellow>Fenrir</color> has {4} Health and {5} Armor, claws enemies for {6} <color=yellow>damage</color>, and triggers {7} <color=yellow>attack effects</color>.
St_Q_MoonlightPact.lore:
The pact with the moonlight was once a joyful game to quell the mischievous chaos of a playful sibling. 
The moonlight still answers her call, but its light no longer carries the same weight.
St_Q_MoonlightPact.achievementDescription: Enter the Pure White Dream 2 times as Nachia.

St_Q_Reduction.name: Reduction
St_Q_Reduction.description: <color=yellow>Sacrifice</color> 10% of your Maximum Health to throw thin Gold Shards forward 3 times. The Gold Shards pierce through targets, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>95%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> to enemies hit and <color=yellow>healing</color> allies for <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>18%</color><sprite=5>.
St_Q_Reduction.rawDesc: <color=yellow>Sacrifice</color> {0} of your Maximum Health to throw thin Gold Shards forward {1} times. The Gold Shards pierce through targets, dealing {2} <color=yellow>damage</color> to enemies hit and <color=yellow>healing</color> allies for {3}.
St_Q_Reduction.lore:
The essence of my research is not destruction, but "reduction." I return objects to their most fundamental particles, then reconstruct them according to my will.
This is the true realm of creation, something the stagnant minds of Arcanum could never imagine.
St_Q_Reduction.achievementDescription: Cast Golden Explosion 9 times within 5 seconds as Aurena.

St_Q_SuperNova.name: Supernova
St_Q_SuperNova.description: Creates an expanding star at the target location that slows enemies, then channels for up to 3 seconds. You can't attack or use Memories while channeling. Reactivating <color=yellow>Supernova</color> detonates the star, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to enemies. The explosion becomes more powerful with charge time, increasing damage up to 225% after 1.3 seconds.
St_Q_SuperNova.rawDesc: Creates an expanding star at the target location that slows enemies, then channels for up to {0} seconds. You can't attack or use Memories while channeling. Reactivating <color=yellow>Supernova</color> detonates the star, dealing {1} <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to enemies. The explosion becomes more powerful with charge time, increasing damage up to {2} after {3} seconds.
St_Q_SuperNova.shortDescription: Charge to deal powerful Light damage
St_Q_SuperNova.lore:
What a beautiful and tragic paradox.
Stars burn their very essence to shine their brightest,
only for that moment to signal the start of eternal silence.

St_Q_SylvanCall.name: Sylvan Call
St_Q_SylvanCall.description:
<color=yellow>Summon</color> a <color=yellow>Leaf Hound</color> that follows Nachia at the target location, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>130%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>stunning</color> them for 0.4 seconds.

The <color=yellow>Leaf Hound</color> has 140 Health and 40 Armor, remains on the battlefield for up to 25 seconds, and claws enemies to deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>60%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color>. You can have up to 5 Leaf Hounds summoned at once.
St_Q_SylvanCall.rawDesc:
<color=yellow>Summon</color> a <color=yellow>Leaf Hound</color> that follows Nachia at the target location, dealing {0} <color=yellow>damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>stunning</color> them for {1} seconds.

The <color=yellow>Leaf Hound</color> has {2} Health and {3} Armor, remains on the battlefield for up to {4} seconds, and claws enemies to deal {5} <color=yellow>damage</color>. You can have up to {6} Leaf Hounds summoned at once.
St_Q_SylvanCall.lore:
The purest spirits in the Ethereal Forest are born from fallen leaves and morning dew.
When Nachia, the guardian of the forest, calls out, these strange "hounds" willingly appear to answer her call.

St_QR_DistortedMind.name: Distorted Mind
St_QR_DistortedMind.description: <color=yellow>Hold</color> to charge a volley of psychic arrows. Release to rain 1~4<sprite=5> psychic arrows on nearby enemies, based on charge time. Each psychic arrow deals <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>150%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> to enemies in a small area.
St_QR_DistortedMind.rawDesc: <color=yellow>Hold</color> to charge a volley of psychic arrows. Release to rain {0}~{1} psychic arrows on nearby enemies, based on charge time. Each psychic arrow deals {2} <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> to enemies in a small area.
St_QR_DistortedMind.lore:
But the world as the girl saw it was, at times, terribly twisted. 

When the old book in her mind imagined mischievous stories, 
fragments of distorted thoughts poured down from the sky like black rain. 

Those caught in this rain 
became trapped in the darkest chamber of the mind.
St_QR_DistortedMind.achievementDescription: Deal a total of 250,000 Dark damage to enemies as Bismuth.

St_QR_InfernalTales.name: Tales of Hellfire
St_QR_InfernalTales.description: Creates a ring of flames around you for 3 seconds. Enemies touching the flame ring take <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>250%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> per second.
St_QR_InfernalTales.rawDesc: Creates a ring of flames around you for {0} seconds. Enemies touching the flame ring take {1} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> per second.
St_QR_InfernalTales.lore:
One day, the girl read a story about a mighty dragon. 

"I want to be strong like a dragon too!" 

As she thought this, 
the old book cheerfully turned its pages. 

Soon, flames like a dragon's hot breath rose from the girl's body, 
and everyone around her smiled more brightly than any star as they danced with her.
St_QR_InfernalTales.achievementDescription: Defeat a Heroic Boss without taking any damage as Bismuth.

St_QR_Innocence.name: Pure Soul
St_QR_Innocence.description: Fires 3<sprite=5> soul missiles at nearby enemies. Each missile explodes, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>120%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> to enemies and slowing their <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> by 60% for 1 seconds.
St_QR_Innocence.rawDesc: Fires {0} soul missiles at nearby enemies. Each missile explodes, dealing {1} <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> to enemies and slowing their <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> by {2} for {3} seconds.
St_QR_Innocence.shortDescription: Area Light damage, reduces Movement Speed
St_QR_Innocence.lore:
Once upon a time, there was a very small girl. 
Whenever she saw bad people, her heart would ache. 

So, she would take the shining pieces of her own heart and toss them to the villains. 
Whenever that pure light touched someone, even the worst of hearts would grow gentle. 

The villains would suddenly realize all the wrong they had done, and with tears in their eyes, they would drift off into a deep, peaceful sleep.

St_QR_ValiantHeart.name: Valiant Heart
St_QR_ValiantHeart.description: Swing a magical sword at the nearest enemies, dealing <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>300%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> and slightly knocking them back. When the sword hits an enemy, Bismuth's <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> increases by 15%<sprite=5> for 1 seconds.
St_QR_ValiantHeart.rawDesc: Swing a magical sword at the nearest enemies, dealing {0} <color=yellow>damage</color> and slightly knocking them back. When the sword hits an enemy, Bismuth's <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> increases by {1} for {2} seconds.
St_QR_ValiantHeart.lore:
The girl firmly believed she was the brave protagonist of a story she was writing herself. 

'Sword of courage, appear!' 

When the girl shouted, 
the old book placed a shining piece of story in her hand. 

When people saw the gleaming sword, they suddenly cried out and rushed toward her. 
They were all villains hiding their wicked hearts! 

'Take this, villains!' 

The girl bravely cut them down one by one with her sword!
St_QR_ValiantHeart.achievementDescription: Enter the Pure White Dream as Bismuth.

St_R_AnnihilationStance.name: Annihilation Stance
St_R_AnnihilationStance.description: Envelop your blade with destructive <color=yellow>Sword Energy</color> for 10 seconds. While this is active, you cannot <color=yellow>cast</color> <color=yellow>Memories</color>, but your <color=yellow>Attack Damage</color> increases by 30%<sprite=5>, your <color=yellow>Attack Range</color> is increased, and each <color=yellow>basic attack</color> fires <color=yellow>Sword Energy</color> that deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>400%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> to enemies. You can perform 1.5<sprite=5> <color=yellow>basic attacks</color> per second while this effect is active, and this rate is not affected by other Attack Speed effects.
St_R_AnnihilationStance.rawDesc: Envelop your blade with destructive <color=yellow>Sword Energy</color> for {0} seconds. While this is active, you cannot <color=yellow>cast</color> <color=yellow>Memories</color>, but your <color=yellow>Attack Damage</color> increases by {1}, your <color=yellow>Attack Range</color> is increased, and each <color=yellow>basic attack</color> fires <color=yellow>Sword Energy</color> that deals {2} <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> to enemies. You can perform {3} <color=yellow>basic attacks</color> per second while this effect is active, and this rate is not affected by other Attack Speed effects.

St_R_BlackArbalest.name: Black Arbalest
St_R_BlackArbalest.description: Fires an arbalest bolt that <color=yellow>pierces</color> through enemies, dealing <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>250%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark damage</color>, knocking them back, and triggering <color=yellow>attack effects</color>. Each time an enemy is <color=yellow>pierced</color>, the <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt to the next enemy increases by 35%.
St_R_BlackArbalest.rawDesc: Fires an arbalest bolt that <color=yellow>pierces</color> through enemies, dealing {0} <color=yellow>Dark damage</color>, knocking them back, and triggering <color=yellow>attack effects</color>. Each time an enemy is <color=yellow>pierced</color>, the <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt to the next enemy increases by {1}.

St_R_BoneCrusher.name: Bone Crusher
St_R_BoneCrusher.description:
Become <color=yellow>Unstoppable</color> and <color=yellow>dash</color> forward until hitting a wall. Deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>135%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> to enemies you hit and drag them along. Upon hitting a wall, unleash a shockwave that deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>300%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> and <color=yellow>stuns</color> for 1.5 seconds.
Gain a <color=yellow>Barrier</color> equal to 10%<sprite=5> of your <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color>, which disappears 1 seconds after the dash ends.
St_R_BoneCrusher.rawDesc:
Become <color=yellow>Unstoppable</color> and <color=yellow>dash</color> forward until hitting a wall. Deal {0} <color=yellow>damage</color> to enemies you hit and drag them along. Upon hitting a wall, unleash a shockwave that deals {1} <color=yellow>damage</color> and <color=yellow>stuns</color> for {2} seconds.
Gain a <color=yellow>Barrier</color> equal to {3} of your <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color>, which disappears {4} seconds after the dash ends.

St_R_Cataclysm.name: Cataclysm
St_R_Cataclysm.description: Gain a Barrier of <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>150%</color><sprite=5> and increase <color=yellow>Ability Power</color> by 30% for 12 seconds. During this time, <color=yellow>Cataclysm</color> can be reactivated up to 3 times to drop meteors at target locations. Meteors briefly stun enemies and deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>250%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color>.
St_R_Cataclysm.rawDesc: Gain a Barrier of {0} and increase <color=yellow>Ability Power</color> by {1} for {2} seconds. During this time, <color=yellow>Cataclysm</color> can be reactivated up to {3} times to drop meteors at target locations. Meteors briefly stun enemies and deal {4} <color=yellow>Light damage</color>.
St_R_Cataclysm.shortDescription: Increases Ability Power, reactivate to summon meteors
St_R_Cataclysm.lore:
Don't be too hasty, Polaris.
There's no need to despair over your own ignorance.

I'll face the truth with these eyes and choose my path with this heart.

St_R_ChainReaction.name: Chain Reaction
St_R_ChainReaction.description: Inscribe a <color=yellow>Dismantle Sigil</color> at the target location that lasts for 6 seconds. Enemies inside the sigil take <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>150%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> per second, and allies inside heal for <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>44%</color><sprite=5> Health per second for each enemy inside. When hitting a <color=yellow>boss</color>, <color=yellow>damage</color> and <color=yellow>healing</color> are increased by 200%.
St_R_ChainReaction.rawDesc: Inscribe a <color=yellow>Dismantle Sigil</color> at the target location that lasts for {0} seconds. Enemies inside the sigil take {1} <color=yellow>damage</color> per second, and allies inside heal for {2} Health per second for each enemy inside. When hitting a <color=yellow>boss</color>, <color=yellow>damage</color> and <color=yellow>healing</color> are increased by {3}.
St_R_ChainReaction.lore:
This is perfect proof of my theory.
Decomposition and combination trigger one another, creating a chain reaction according to the laws I have established.
There are countless ways to use this power, depending on how it is shaped.

I must continue my research.
St_R_ChainReaction.achievementDescription: As Aurena, restore at least 60% of your Maximum Health in one cast of Dangerous Theory when your Health is below 40%.

St_R_Chomp.name: Chomp
St_R_Chomp.description: Bites the target enemy, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>370%</color><sprite=5> damage and restoring <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>75%</color><sprite=5> Health.
St_R_Chomp.rawDesc: Bites the target enemy, dealing {0} damage and restoring {1} Health.
St_R_Chomp.lore:
The metallic scent of blood, shreds of torn flesh, a surge of vitality. And what remains...

A single finger.

St_R_DangerousTheory.name: Dangerous Theory
St_R_DangerousTheory.description:
Dash forward and empower your next <color=yellow>basic attack</color>. This <color=yellow>basic attack</color> becomes a <color=yellow>critical strike</color>, deals <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>125%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>additional damage</color>, and knocks back the target.

If your <color=yellow>current Health</color> is below 60% when casting <color=yellow>Dangerous Theory</color>, the <color=yellow>additional damage</color> increases by 100%, the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> is reduced by 25%, and you <color=yellow>restore</color> <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>67%</color><sprite=5> Health for each enemy hit. Against <color=yellow>bosses</color>, <color=yellow>additional damage</color> and <color=yellow>healing</color> increase by 100%.
St_R_DangerousTheory.rawDesc:
Dash forward and empower your next <color=yellow>basic attack</color>. This <color=yellow>basic attack</color> becomes a <color=yellow>critical strike</color>, deals {0} <color=yellow>additional damage</color>, and knocks back the target.

If your <color=yellow>current Health</color> is below {1} when casting <color=yellow>Dangerous Theory</color>, the <color=yellow>additional damage</color> increases by {2}, the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> is reduced by {3}, and you <color=yellow>restore</color> {4} Health for each enemy hit. Against <color=yellow>bosses</color>, <color=yellow>additional damage</color> and <color=yellow>healing</color> increase by {5}.
St_R_DangerousTheory.lore:
The cowards at Arcanum called this theory "unacceptably dangerous."
Fools.

They failed to grasp the elegance of the theory where matter, put under extreme conditions, produces the most explosive results. I am simply proving my hypothesis.

St_R_FlamingWhip.name: Flaming Whip
St_R_FlamingWhip.description:
Swings a flaming whip, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to enemies in front and briefly reducing their <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color>.
<color=yellow>Casting</color> a Memory other than <color=yellow>Flaming Whip</color> resets the whip's <color=yellow>cooldown</color>.
St_R_FlamingWhip.rawDesc:
Swings a flaming whip, dealing {0} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to enemies in front and briefly reducing their <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color>.
<color=yellow>Casting</color> a Memory other than <color=yellow>Flaming Whip</color> resets the whip's <color=yellow>cooldown</color>.
St_R_FlamingWhip.achievementDescription: Defeat an enemy while they have 30 or more Fire stacks.

St_R_Frostbite.name: Frostbite
St_R_Frostbite.description: Your next 2 <color=yellow>attacks</color> are faster and empowered. The first attack deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>50%</color><sprite=5> additional <color=yellow>Cold damage</color> and grants you a <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>110%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Barrier</color> that lasts for 2 seconds. The second attack deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>180%</color><sprite=5> additional <color=yellow>Cold damage</color>.
St_R_Frostbite.rawDesc: Your next 2 <color=yellow>attacks</color> are faster and empowered. The first attack deals {0} additional <color=yellow>Cold damage</color> and grants you a {1} <color=yellow>Barrier</color> that lasts for {2} seconds. The second attack deals {3} additional <color=yellow>Cold damage</color>.

St_R_GlacialHammer.name: Glacial Hammer
St_R_GlacialHammer.description: Slam a hammer of ice in front of you, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>220%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Cold damage</color> to enemies and pulling them towards your location. Enemies hit directly at the center of the hammer take <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>385%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Cold damage</color> instead.
St_R_GlacialHammer.rawDesc: Slam a hammer of ice in front of you, dealing {0} <color=yellow>Cold damage</color> to enemies and pulling them towards your location. Enemies hit directly at the center of the hammer take {1} <color=yellow>Cold damage</color> instead.

St_R_GreatFrostSword.name: Great Frost Sword
St_R_GreatFrostSword.description: Summon and swing a great frost sword, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Cold damage</color> to enemies in front and knocking them back. If it hits a single target, <color=yellow>damage</color> is increased by 200%.
St_R_GreatFrostSword.rawDesc: Summon and swing a great frost sword, dealing {0} <color=yellow>Cold damage</color> to enemies in front and knocking them back. If it hits a single target, <color=yellow>damage</color> is increased by {1}.

St_R_Ignite.name: Ignite
St_R_Ignite.description: Deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>115%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to the target. If the target is already burning, damage is increased by 50% and deals <color=yellow>Area damage</color>. Charges are fully restored at once.
St_R_Ignite.rawDesc: Deals {0} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to the target. If the target is already burning, damage is increased by {1} and deals <color=yellow>Area damage</color>. Charges are fully restored at once.

St_R_Immolation.name: Immolation
St_R_Immolation.description: Ignite your body, sacrificing 12% of your current Health over 3.5 seconds. While burning, your <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> increases by 20%<sprite=5> and you deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>165%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> per second to nearby enemies.
St_R_Immolation.rawDesc: Ignite your body, sacrificing {0} of your current Health over {1} seconds. While burning, your <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> increases by {2} and you deal {3} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> per second to nearby enemies.
St_R_Immolation.shortDescription: Sacrifice Health, deal Fire damage to nearby enemies
St_R_Immolation.lore:
This frail, weary body will soon become the last shackle that binds me.
Though I have wandered through poverty and pain all my life, not once did I doubt Him. The priest of the Order said, "The purest souls burn themselves to cast off the chains of flesh, and only then can they become light that reaches El'pyros."

I am not afraid.
Rather, I am grateful. That the final moment of this painful life could be so glorious... what greater mercy could there be?

There, I can see the Solar Spire. Soon, I too will become part of that light.
Oh, radiant sun!


- Memory trace from a small burnt body near the Solar Spire.

St_R_Inspire.name: Battle Cry
St_R_Inspire.description: <color=yellow>Inspires</color> all nearby allies for 4 seconds. <color=yellow>Inspired</color> allies gain a 10%<sprite=5> increase to <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> and deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>13%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>additional damage</color> on <color=yellow>attack</color>. You receive 200% of the effect.
St_R_Inspire.rawDesc: <color=yellow>Inspires</color> all nearby allies for {0} seconds. <color=yellow>Inspired</color> allies gain a {1} increase to <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> and deal {2} <color=yellow>additional damage</color> on <color=yellow>attack</color>. You receive {3} of the effect.

St_R_LightningDance.name: Lightning Dance
St_R_LightningDance.description:
Briefly transform into an <color=yellow>Invulnerable</color> <color=yellow>lightning</color> that bounces between the target and nearby enemies, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>120%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color>. Can bounce up to 4 times.

<color=yellow>Attacking</color> reduces this Memory's <color=yellow>cooldown</color> by 5%.
St_R_LightningDance.rawDesc:
Briefly transform into an <color=yellow>Invulnerable</color> <color=yellow>lightning</color> that bounces between the target and nearby enemies, dealing {0} <color=yellow>Light damage</color>. Can bounce up to {1} times.

<color=yellow>Attacking</color> reduces this Memory's <color=yellow>cooldown</color> by {2}.

St_R_NaturesWhisper.name: Nature's Whisper
St_R_NaturesWhisper.description: Command all of Nachia's summons to move to the target location or attack the target enemy. Increases <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> of Nachia and all her summons by 18%<sprite=5> for 3 seconds.
St_R_NaturesWhisper.rawDesc: Command all of Nachia's summons to move to the target location or attack the target enemy. Increases <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> of Nachia and all her summons by {0} for {1} seconds.
St_R_NaturesWhisper.lore:
No words are needed between Nachia and her spirits. With just a sad sigh or a determined look, the entire forest carries her will.
Her gentle whisper then leads her children straight to the hearts of her enemies.

St_R_OrbOfLight.name: Orb of Light
St_R_OrbOfLight.description: Launch an <color=yellow>Orb of Light</color> forward, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to enemies. If the <color=yellow>Orb of Light</color> hits an enemy, a <color=yellow>Flame of Life</color> returns, restoring allies it touches for <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>25%</color><sprite=5> Health for each enemy hit. If it hits a <color=yellow>boss</color>, <color=yellow>healing</color> is increased by <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>75%</color><sprite=5>.
St_R_OrbOfLight.rawDesc: Launch an <color=yellow>Orb of Light</color> forward, dealing {0} <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to enemies. If the <color=yellow>Orb of Light</color> hits an enemy, a <color=yellow>Flame of Life</color> returns, restoring allies it touches for {1} Health for each enemy hit. If it hits a <color=yellow>boss</color>, <color=yellow>healing</color> is increased by {2}.
St_R_OrbOfLight.achievementDescription: Enter the Pure White Dream while having 4 Active Light Attribute Memories.

St_R_Parry.name: Parry
St_R_Parry.description: Parry the first incoming damage from the front within 0.6 seconds, dealing <color=yellow>damage</color> to up to 5<sprite=5> enemies. Enemies hit take <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>360%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color>, are <color=yellow>stunned</color>, and the <color=yellow>Astrid's Masterpiece</color> effect resets. Successfully parrying makes you briefly <color=yellow>immune</color> to all damage and reduces <color=yellow>Parry</color>'s <color=yellow>cooldown</color> by 50%.
St_R_Parry.rawDesc: Parry the first incoming damage from the front within {0} seconds, dealing <color=yellow>damage</color> to up to {1} enemies. Enemies hit take {2} <color=yellow>damage</color>, are <color=yellow>stunned</color>, and the <color=yellow>Astrid's Masterpiece</color> effect resets. Successfully parrying makes you briefly <color=yellow>immune</color> to all damage and reduces <color=yellow>Parry</color>'s <color=yellow>cooldown</color> by {3}.
St_R_Parry.lore: Attack and defense are two sides of the same coin.
St_R_Parry.achievementDescription: Defeat 70 enemies in a row without taking damage as Mist.

St_R_PillarOfFlame.name: Pillar of Flame
St_R_PillarOfFlame.description: Summons a pillar of fire at the target location, immediately dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>250%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to all enemies within the area, then deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>275%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> over 2.4 seconds.
St_R_PillarOfFlame.rawDesc: Summons a pillar of fire at the target location, immediately dealing {0} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> to all enemies within the area, then deals {1} <color=yellow>Fire damage</color> over {2} seconds.

St_R_PrecisionShot.name: Precision Shot
St_R_PrecisionShot.description:
<color=yellow>Hold</color> the cast key to enter an aiming stance. After aiming, release to fire a penetrating round that deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>150%</color><sprite=5>-<sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>800%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> to all enemies hit and <color=yellow>stuns</color> them for 0.5-2.5 seconds, based on how long you aimed.
Holding the stance for 1 seconds maximizes range, stun duration, and damage.
St_R_PrecisionShot.rawDesc:
<color=yellow>Hold</color> the cast key to enter an aiming stance. After aiming, release to fire a penetrating round that deals {0}-{1} <color=yellow>damage</color> to all enemies hit and <color=yellow>stuns</color> them for {2}-{3} seconds, based on how long you aimed.
Holding the stance for {4} seconds maximizes range, stun duration, and damage.
St_R_PrecisionShot.lore: After Lacerta's unit disbanded, his rifle skills and tactical expertise allowed him to live self-sufficiently through hunting and gathering.
St_R_PrecisionShot.achievementDescription: Defeat the Heroic Boss with 85% or more Health remaining as Lacerta.

St_R_QuickTrigger.name: Quick Draw
St_R_QuickTrigger.description: Rapidly fire 3 piercing shots that deal <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>120%</color><sprite=5> damage to up to 3 enemies.
St_R_QuickTrigger.rawDesc: Rapidly fire {0} piercing shots that deal {1} damage to up to {2} enemies.
St_R_QuickTrigger.lore: Despite an accident where a bullet hit a guard's knee, the practice of shooting coins dropped from shoulder height remained a popular pastime among the soldiers.

St_R_RepulsiveShield.name: Repulsive Shield
St_R_RepulsiveShield.description: Blocks damage from enemies in front for 1.9<sprite=5> seconds. Each time damage is blocked, deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>240%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> to up to 4 enemies in front.
St_R_RepulsiveShield.rawDesc: Blocks damage from enemies in front for {0} seconds. Each time damage is blocked, deals {1} <color=yellow>damage</color> to up to {2} enemies in front.
St_R_RepulsiveShield.lore:
"Come on, give it all you've got."

"You sure?"

"Yes, go for it!"

The man swung his sword with all his might, only for it to crash against a shield with a resounding metallic clang.

At the same time, a slash mark appeared on the tree behind him.

"What in the world...?"

"Haha, did you see that? I'm invincible now!"


- A memory snippet from a soldier with a scar on the back of his head.

St_R_SanctuaryOfEl.name: El's Sanctuary
St_R_SanctuaryOfEl.description:
<color=yellow>Vesper</color> <color=yellow>blesses</color> the surrounding ground for 10 seconds, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>500%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to nearby enemies and granting allies a <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Barrier</color> that lasts for 4 seconds. Allies on the blessed ground gain 18<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Armor</color> and 20%<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color>.

<color=yellow>Vesper</color> himself receives 200% of the effect and becomes <color=yellow>Unstoppable</color> while under the effect.
St_R_SanctuaryOfEl.rawDesc:
<color=yellow>Vesper</color> <color=yellow>blesses</color> the surrounding ground for {0} seconds, dealing {1} <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to nearby enemies and granting allies a {2} <color=yellow>Barrier</color> that lasts for {3} seconds. Allies on the blessed ground gain {4} <color=yellow>Armor</color> and {5} <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color>.

<color=yellow>Vesper</color> himself receives {6} of the effect and becomes <color=yellow>Unstoppable</color> while under the effect.
St_R_SanctuaryOfEl.lore: I proclaim El'pyros's blessing upon this land! Glory to His servants, and ruin to the abominable heretics!

St_R_Scattershot.name: Scattershot
St_R_Scattershot.description: Fires 5 dark bullets that spread out in front. Each bullet deals <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>100%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> and triggers 50% <color=yellow>attack effects</color>.
St_R_Scattershot.rawDesc: Fires {0} dark bullets that spread out in front. Each bullet deals {1} <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> and triggers {2} <color=yellow>attack effects</color>.

St_R_SerpentineBlessing.name: Serpent's Blessing
St_R_SerpentineBlessing.description:
Grants <color=yellow>Serpent's Blessing</color> to Nachia and the target ally for 12 seconds. This blessing grants 55<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Armor</color> and increases <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> by 25%<sprite=5>. Whenever the blessed target performs a <color=yellow>basic attack</color>, they <color=yellow>restore</color> 2.5%<sprite=5> of their <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color>, and their attack target takes <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>100%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> and is <color=yellow>stunned</color> for 0.5 seconds.

If the blessed target is a <color=yellow>summon</color>, it <color=yellow>restores</color> 25% of its Maximum Health.
St_R_SerpentineBlessing.rawDesc:
Grants <color=yellow>Serpent's Blessing</color> to Nachia and the target ally for {0} seconds. This blessing grants {1} <color=yellow>Armor</color> and increases <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> by {2}. Whenever the blessed target performs a <color=yellow>basic attack</color>, they <color=yellow>restore</color> {3} of their <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color>, and their attack target takes {4} <color=yellow>damage</color> and is <color=yellow>stunned</color> for {5} seconds.

If the blessed target is a <color=yellow>summon</color>, it <color=yellow>restores</color> {6} of its Maximum Health.
St_R_SerpentineBlessing.lore:
In the myths of the Ethereal Forest, the primordial serpent symbolizes life overcoming death and strength blooming from wounds.
Nachia gives this ancient blessing to those she protects.
St_R_SerpentineBlessing.achievementDescription: As Nachia, defeat the Demon of the Forest within 6 seconds after dealing the first damage.

St_R_ShadowOverdrive.name: Shadow Overdrive
St_R_ShadowOverdrive.description: Channels for 0.7 seconds to increase <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> by 30%<sprite=5>. After channeling, launches 5 homing missiles that deal <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>50%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> to random nearby enemies and grants you 20%<sprite=5> increased <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> for 3 seconds.
St_R_ShadowOverdrive.rawDesc: Channels for {0} seconds to increase <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> by {1}. After channeling, launches {2} homing missiles that deal {3} <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> to random nearby enemies and grants you {4} increased <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> for {5} seconds.
St_R_ShadowOverdrive.shortDescription: Dark damage and increases Attack Speed

St_R_ShadowWalk.name: Shadow Walk
St_R_ShadowWalk.description: Quickly dash forward and fire 3 dark shards at nearby enemies. Each shard deals <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>65%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> and triggers 50% <color=yellow>attack effects</color>.
St_R_ShadowWalk.rawDesc: Quickly dash forward and fire {0} dark shards at nearby enemies. Each shard deals {1} <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> and triggers {2} <color=yellow>attack effects</color>.
St_R_ShadowWalk.shortDescription: Dash and attack nearby enemies, Dark

St_R_Smite.name: Lightning Strike
St_R_Smite.description: After a brief delay, strike the area with lightning, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>400%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>stunning</color> them for 1 seconds. Has a 50% chance to set enemies on <color=yellow>fire</color>.
St_R_Smite.rawDesc: After a brief delay, strike the area with lightning, dealing {0} <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>stunning</color> them for {1} seconds. Has a {2} chance to set enemies on <color=yellow>fire</color>.
St_R_Smite.shortDescription: Deal heavy Light damage to target
St_R_Smite.lore:
The Society appears to be filled with elders stuck in their ways, their thinking growing fragile and stagnant. How long will they tinker with trivial rules, basking in their so-called achievements?

Observing the tree scorched by lightning last night sparked an idea. Even such immense natural power must operate under certain laws, doesn't it?

If I can uncover these laws, I might be able to wield that force. Just the thought of it is thrilling. I must begin my research immediately.

St_R_StaticDischarge.name: Static Discharge
St_R_StaticDischarge.description: <color=yellow>Hold</color> to charge up static. When fully charged, detonate the static to deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>150%</color><sprite=5>-<sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>600%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to enemies, based on charge time, knocking them back and reducing their <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color>. Charging for 1 seconds maximizes the damage and area of effect.
St_R_StaticDischarge.rawDesc: <color=yellow>Hold</color> to charge up static. When fully charged, detonate the static to deal {0}-{1} <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to enemies, based on charge time, knocking them back and reducing their <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color>. Charging for {2} seconds maximizes the damage and area of effect.

St_R_Tranquility.name: Tranquility
St_R_Tranquility.description: <color=yellow>Yubar</color> <color=yellow>channels</color> for 1 seconds to regain tranquility, becoming <color=yellow>Invulnerable</color>, with a 40% increase in <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color>, and reducing the <color=yellow>cooldowns</color> of all other Memories by 3.5<sprite=5> seconds.
St_R_Tranquility.rawDesc: <color=yellow>Yubar</color> <color=yellow>channels</color> for {0} seconds to regain tranquility, becoming <color=yellow>Invulnerable</color>, with a {1} increase in <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color>, and reducing the <color=yellow>cooldowns</color> of all other Memories by {2} seconds.
St_R_Tranquility.lore:
Even the cosmos draws new strength from stillness.
In this fleeting peace, my soul will once more embrace the light of creation and be renewed, just as the stars dance along their celestial paths...
St_R_Tranquility.achievementDescription: Deal a total of 400,000 Light damage to enemies as Yubar.

St_R_UnbreakableDetermination.name: Unbreakable Determination
St_R_UnbreakableDetermination.description:
Resets the cooldown of <color=yellow>Swift Steps</color> and <color=yellow>Astrid's Masterpiece</color>, deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>400%</color><sprite=5> damage to nearby enemies, and enters the <color=yellow>awakened state</color> for 12 seconds.

While <color=yellow>awakened</color>, gains 25%<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> and each <color=yellow>attack</color> triggers a lightning explosion, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>90%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> to the target and nearby enemies. When <color=yellow>Astrid's Masterpiece</color> triggers during the <color=yellow>awakened state</color>, recovers Health equal to 4% of your missing Health.
St_R_UnbreakableDetermination.rawDesc:
Resets the cooldown of <color=yellow>Swift Steps</color> and <color=yellow>Astrid's Masterpiece</color>, deals {0} damage to nearby enemies, and enters the <color=yellow>awakened state</color> for {1} seconds.

While <color=yellow>awakened</color>, gains {2} <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> and each <color=yellow>attack</color> triggers a lightning explosion, dealing {3} <color=yellow>damage</color> to the target and nearby enemies. When <color=yellow>Astrid's Masterpiece</color> triggers during the <color=yellow>awakened state</color>, recovers Health equal to {4} of your missing Health.
St_R_UnbreakableDetermination.lore: Is this what life is? If so, then once more.

St_U_BeamOfBalance.name: Beam of Balance
St_U_BeamOfBalance.description: Ascend for 8 seconds, becoming <color=yellow>Invulnerable</color>. During this time, control a slow-moving <color=yellow>Beam of Balance</color> that deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>350%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> per second to enemies and <color=yellow>heals</color> allies for <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>150%</color><sprite=5> per second.
St_U_BeamOfBalance.rawDesc: Ascend for {0} seconds, becoming <color=yellow>Invulnerable</color>. During this time, control a slow-moving <color=yellow>Beam of Balance</color> that deals {1} <color=yellow>damage</color> per second to enemies and <color=yellow>heals</color> allies for {2} per second.
St_U_BeamOfBalance.shortDescription: Wield a massive beam that deals damage and heals

St_U_Burrow.name: Burrow
St_U_Burrow.description:
Burrow underground, becoming <color=yellow>Invulnerable</color> for 2.5 seconds and increasing <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> by 30%<sprite=5>. Emerging knocks up and <color=yellow>stuns</color> nearby enemies for 1 seconds and deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>550%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color>.
Can be recast to end the effect early.
St_U_Burrow.rawDesc:
Burrow underground, becoming <color=yellow>Invulnerable</color> for {0} seconds and increasing <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color> by {1}. Emerging knocks up and <color=yellow>stuns</color> nearby enemies for {2} seconds and deals {3} <color=yellow>damage</color>.
Can be recast to end the effect early.

St_U_HerWorld.name: Her World
St_U_HerWorld.description:
Turn into a <color=yellow>Black Hole</color> for 7 seconds. All enemies are pulled towards the Black Hole, and enemies in contact with it take <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>500%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color> per second. At the end of its duration, the Black Hole explodes, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>1,200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to all nearby enemies and <color=yellow>stunning</color> them for 2.5 seconds.

In the Black Hole state, gain 120<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Armor</color> and become immune to death.
St_U_HerWorld.rawDesc:
Turn into a <color=yellow>Black Hole</color> for {0} seconds. All enemies are pulled towards the Black Hole, and enemies in contact with it take {1} <color=yellow>Light damage</color> per second. At the end of its duration, the Black Hole explodes, dealing {2} <color=yellow>Light damage</color> to all nearby enemies and <color=yellow>stunning</color> them for {3} seconds.

In the Black Hole state, gain {4} <color=yellow>Armor</color> and become immune to death.
St_U_HerWorld.lore:
Nyx, the brightest star in the eternal night sky,
Mmy soul's muse and my goddess.

I tear out the heart of my power and offer it to you.
Create your own realm, a kingdom of darkness and silence.

My existence is driven by one desire:
for you to remain the center of my universe...


- Memory trace of Erebos's vow to Nyx.

St_U_Hysteria.name: Hysteria
St_U_Hysteria.description: Embrace intense rage for 6 seconds, during which you can't <color=yellow>cast</color> other Memories. During this time, unleash continuous claw slashes that deal <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>100%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>restore</color> your Health for <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>13%</color><sprite=5>. If your Health is below 40%, healing is increased by 150%. Triggers <color=yellow>attack effects</color> on the first target hit. Slashes faster with higher <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color>.
St_U_Hysteria.rawDesc: Embrace intense rage for {0} seconds, during which you can't <color=yellow>cast</color> other Memories. During this time, unleash continuous claw slashes that deal {1} <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>restore</color> your Health for {2}. If your Health is below {3}, healing is increased by {4}. Triggers <color=yellow>attack effects</color> on the first target hit. Slashes faster with higher <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color>.
St_U_Hysteria.lore:
The nightmare's corruption was not a sudden event. It seeped in slowly, like poison, through the deep wounds he received while protecting the forest.

First, his horns twisted into demonic shapes, even though they once marked him as a forest guardian. Then came his nails. From hands that once nurtured life, black claws grew, ready to tear everything apart. The warmth and mischievous playfulness in his eyes disappeared, replaced by the red light of a starving beast. It was as if his original purpose was being both denied and mocked.

As his reason faded and pure pain and fury took hold of his body, he let out one final, broken breath.

"Nachia... I'm sorry..."

But those words reached no one, fading away at the very moment the last spark of the being called "Belphomet" was extinguished.

This was both his last cry and the first howl of the nightmare that took over his body.

St_U_ShoutOfOblivion.name: Shout of Oblivion
St_U_ShoutOfOblivion.description:
Become <color=yellow>Invulnerable</color> briefly while channeling, then unleash a powerful cry forward, dealing <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>1,300%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> to all enemies and <color=yellow>stunning</color> them for 3 seconds.

This <color=yellow>damage</color> increases by 25% for each current <color=yellow>Hunt Threat Level</color>.
St_U_ShoutOfOblivion.rawDesc:
Become <color=yellow>Invulnerable</color> briefly while channeling, then unleash a powerful cry forward, dealing {0} <color=yellow>Dark damage</color> to all enemies and <color=yellow>stunning</color> them for {1} seconds.

This <color=yellow>damage</color> increases by {2} for each current <color=yellow>Hunt Threat Level</color>.

St_U_WorldCracker.name: World Cracker
St_U_WorldCracker.description: Channels a powerful beam that deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>575%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light damage</color> per second to all enemies it touches. You can't move while channeling, but can maintain it indefinitely until canceled.
St_U_WorldCracker.rawDesc: Channels a powerful beam that deals {0} <color=yellow>Light damage</color> per second to all enemies it touches. You can't move while channeling, but can maintain it indefinitely until canceled.
St_U_WorldCracker.lore:
A memory trace of one who was once among the most powerful beings in the world of dreams. It is a fragment of power from one who was king and god of all spirits.

Wielding the authority of divine radiance, he could reduce entire worlds to ashes with a single blow. He challenged the master of worlds but was defeated, and afterward, his whereabouts became unknown. Rumor holds he was imprisoned in another dimension, lost most of his power, and was left as nothing more than an ordinary king.

Yet the whispers told a different story.
They spoke of the symbol of his servitude having disappeared.
